Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #the Biggoron Sword#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #northern basement of the Water Temple# contains...^ #the Weird Egg# and #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Water Temple GS Near Boss Key Chest

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that ##the Deku Tree## has #3# major items.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to #ReDeads# guarding a chest.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Green Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that in the castle courtyard you can see a portrait of a young Talon.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Potion Bottle#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that ##Jabu Jabu's Belly## has #3# major items.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals a #grave with a free chest#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that a #spider's symphony in the Spirit Temple# yields #a Green Rupee#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Castle# is a foolish choice.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: Gossip Stone Shuffle must be on. I'm normally in Zora's Domain!

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##Zora's Fountain## has #3# major items.
